website_summaries.verdict: High performance functionality meets style in these easy to use salt and pepper grinders. Excellent quality from a trusted brand.
pros: Ergonomic design with a non-slip base provides superior grip to make grinding a breeze
Ceramic grinders deliver versatile use and are resistant to corrosion
Wide openings for mess-free refills and upper grinding mechanism ensures surfaces remain clean
Stainless steel accents add a modern appeal
cons: No lid to keep contents fresh
Grind selection could be easier to use

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but fataly flawed
customer_reviews.text: After almost five years of use, these are still going strong. That's the only reason that I haven't trashed and replaced them until now. The pepper grinder will adjust the overall coarseness of the grind, but any sort of uniformity is sadly lacking. The salt grinder seems to have only one setting, extra fine, regardless of the coarseness of the original. The only reason that I give it more than a one star rating is its stubborn resistance to breaking.
customer_reviews.author: seh1

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have had this OXO grinder set for quite a while. It works fine and looks fine too. The grinders are big enough, so you don't have to fill them out often. But I have some issues with the set: a) I use the smallest settings on each. Pepper is fine, but salt is still too coarse for my liking. b) The amount of ground pepper coming out is very small, so you have to crank a lot, whereas ground salt comes out too fast. c) they are plastic in the middle, not glass. One of them was already burnt on the side by my hot griddle. So, be mindful where you leave them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Another great OXO product!
customer_reviews.text: OXO has designed another fine product for the kitchen. These salt & pepper grinders have a solid feel with a good grinding mechanism. Thoughtful design additions are: top v. bottom dispensing (so bits of salt & pepper don't end up on the counter when you set the unit down) and the wide filler port. I couldn't give this product 5 stars because while the grind selector has 5 settings, there's really only fine, medium and coarse grind. Additionally, the price point is a bit steep. Even in light of those 2 things, I still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mtnbiker

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic blade and multiple crack settings
customer_reviews.text: I received the first set and it was clearly used before and it was a completely different set than what was pictured. The box was ripped open and the plastic covering was ripped off. I contacted Amazon customer service via chat and got this taken care of immediately. Received the new set the next day and these work great. Very comfortable feeling and adjustable crack settings. I decided to splurge and get a more expensive set because of the ceramic blade and I hope this will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem that other users have reported. I've only used the pepper grinder for just a couple months, and today the lid popped off and sprayed pepper everywhere. Reassembling it looks difficult or impossible, as miscellaneous grinder-parts (springs, washers) are now mixed in with the remaining pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good concept poor execution
customer_reviews.text: We like the design and that salt or pepper does not dirty the counter. Filling it is easy too. Where this product really falls down is it’s main function, pepper grinding. At the finest setting the pepper is coarse and inconsistent. Larger settings are ultra coarse not even worth moving the setting. The mechanism seems a little loose but can’t tell if that is by design or just poor manufacturing quality. The salt grinder doesn’t seem to have the same problem so more likely a quality problem unless intentionally designed that way. The product had promise but ultimately disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver that works really well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set we have purchased, we have two apartments and this set if for our second one. However as we live in Hong Kong we deal with different space and climate issues, this OXO grinder set is a handy size for a small apartment, very easy to refill, caps fit tight so no humidity can wreck the salt. Good selection of grinder adjustment, which my husband likes as he is a heavy pepper user. Clear containers takes the guess work out of the refill process. Smart enough to put on the table at anytime. Would recommend this product for space and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gerie

customer_reviews.title: Best salt & pepper grinder I've found to date
customer_reviews.text: I've tried at least a dozen or so salt & pepper grinder sets, and this one has been the only one I have zero complaints about. I also wasn't expecting the set to come with salt & pepper already in them, which was a nice bonus. So many sets I have purchased either degrade quickly, spill out salt/pepper from the bottom, come loose, or don't grind the pepper fine enough. These ones are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Parent

customer_reviews.title: Made to break after little use
customer_reviews.text: It cant grind at correct settings. It will break after 4 months of use. I have exchanged it a few times. They all break about 4 months. Update I just extended it again and it just broke, again. I have a $5 plastic cheep target brand that I got for work. It has not broken in 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: attilakb

customer_reviews.title: Great grinders! They fill very solid and not cheaply ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grinders! They fill very solid and not cheaply made. They open easily to fill with salt/pepper, and they're very easy to operate. The grinding mechanism is very smooth feeling and it's easy enough to operate one handed while holding it. The grain size selector is great and allows you to choose exactly the size you need! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bado

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting salt and pepper grinders that you turn upside down to use
customer_reviews.text: I had an old set of OXO salt and pepper grinders for years. They convinced me that these are the best pepper and salt grinders I have ever had. I use them every day for the kitchen and for the table. The best thing is that because the salt and pepper come out of the top, the table and countertops are not covered with spare salt and pepper. It is really easy to change the size of the grounds. Also the grinder piece is very easy to grasp and turn (good for old hands). I love them. I have given them as gifts, and passed on my old ones. They are magic!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie'sview

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: When I say "easy to use," it is very easy to use for elderly individuals. The last pepper and salt grinder set was hard for my parents to hold, twist and to refill. This set is so much easier for them to use. Additionally, the clear body allows them to see if it is getting low to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Owens

customer_reviews.title: no help from the mfg.
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with one grinder. called the mfg. then sent photo and told them the problem. no one got back to me amazon told me to return to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salt and Pepper Innovation
customer_reviews.text: Salt and pepper freshly ground is a luxury in the kitchen, but with these shakers/grinders, it is easy. Simple to use with no mess: Invert, grind, re-invert, set on counter. Can't be simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Carbon Biker

customer_reviews.title: Salt works great. Pepper, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The salt grinder works so well and feels good in the hand. Each crank delivers a satisfying crack of salt. The pepper grinder does not have this feel. It's almost like it's spinning more than it's grinding, unless I put it on the largest grind setting. Takes many many turns to crack out a decent amount of pepper. The design is good for not leaving salt and pepper on your table or counter.
customer_reviews.author: michelina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST SALT AND PEPPER SHAKERS! My parents have these and my boyfriend literally asked for them for his birthday lol you can change the top to have thinner or thicker grains coming out which is nice cuz he liked thicker and I like thinner. Over worth the price, they have lasted at my parents house for years.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Great combo. Consider it an investment in your sanity.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't stood the test of time yet since I bought them recently, but they are by far the most robust grinders I have had. They are seriously both amazing compared to any cheaper option I have had. I regret cheaping out and buying several cheaper options first. WORLDS of difference. Given the materials used in the grinder I wouldn't be surprised if they last a good long while. The size selector is easy and makes a pretty big difference. The true range on the grain size is actually better than I expected. I like that they sit upright. This keeps from making a mess on the counter or on the shelf all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great salt and pepper mills
customer_reviews.text: I really like fresh ground pepper so I’ve been trying various pepper mills for years. My wife saw these at someone’s house and they work great. They don’t have a lid to lose or break, you just turn them over and twist them. And you can easily adjust the size of grind you what before each use if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: the very best salt & pepper grinders!
customer_reviews.text: we love this set! ... they perform very well, keep the counters clean with top side dispensing orientation, they are easy to twist, and grind consistently with 5 settings - fine to course. they have been very durable and look like the day we purchased them almost 4 years ago... easy to fill, easy to keep clean, and they look nice on the counter... another fine OXO product... we are very, very pleased! Thank you. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Chris & dekeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Dispensing
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My last grinders I had to turn and turn and sometimes salt would come out and other times I wouldn’t. This always gives the same amount each small little turn. Very consistent. The only downside is it’s not intuitive the first time you use it that the salt/pepper comes out of the top. But after 15 seconds this is no longer a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Best grinders ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these salt and pepper grinders, you can adjust the grind, easy to refill, and really all around great! This set is going to be a Christmas gift for a couple that loved them at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Morrell

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE!!  GREAT VALUE!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Usually when you buy OXO, you sort of a second class item that works, but? These are really nice looking, well made and solid! For what they are and from OXO I took the gamble on the high price. (You know what they say "even a blind squirrel can find a nut once in a while") I am very pleased!! My only complaint is that the pepper is stale and you need to buy some fresh spices pepper corns!!!
customer_reviews.author: R Daniel Pfennig

customer_reviews.title: I do like them
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. They are easy to fill, easy to grind and they have easy to adjust grind size. Although a bit pricey for a salt and pepper grinder set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Some choices are hard.  This is the right set.
customer_reviews.text: Choosing just the right salt and pepper set can be so daunting. I am really happy I decided on this set. All the features that made me choose it really have applied. I like the look. I like that the salt and pepper come out of the top and so when I set it down on the counter or table I don't have a dusting of pepper left underneath. They are easy to fill (from the bottom). The coarseness of the grind is easily adjustable. I have had them over a year now and OXO has stayed true to my expectations in that they are comfortable to hold and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder set
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are great. Nice enough to sit on the table, but utilitarian enough to use in food prep. I've had them for about 6 months now and we've refilled once and they're still working great. One thing I would note is that the coarseness selector is not sealed. It will allow water into the grinder. I ground with oily hands once and tried to clean it then rinse upside down so the water couldn't enter the "top". Unfortunately water still got in through the selector. Not really a flaw, but something to note if you try to clean it while it's full.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: The Best.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second pair because I got tired of hauling them from the kitchen to the dining room and back. I am finicky about pepper grinders. This grinder may be as good as any I have bought. The adjustable function allows everyone to have it their way though I leave mine on the coarsest setting. I love that one turns them over to grind, there are rubberized handles for grinding, and then tipping it back over nothing gets spilled on the table. Look great too.
customer_reviews.author: John F Karp

customer_reviews.title: Can’t grind pink Himalayan
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace another set of grinders that left a mess. They succeed in that area, but they can’t handle coarse pink Himalayan salt, and it’s a struggle to get black peppercorns ground. Several shakes and twists later, I end up with inconsistent ground pepper. Love the design of these, but they’re not worth it if you’ve used other grinders and expect good results.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Adams

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: you can dispense large or small grains; easily grinds. I only wish it was made with wood. Looks a bit cheap but works better then most
customer_reviews.author: PJ Hoxie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better looking in person. The finishes are nice and they are weighted perfectly to feel good in your hand. Having the grinder sit in the upright position when not is use is an excellent design. The dust (especially from the pepper) doesn't end up on the table. The grinder operates smoothly and with little resistance, but doesn't feel loose. The size of grind adjusts easily and has a pretty good difference between settings. These are beautifully made. My son has had the pepper grinder for several years and it is still going strong. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a 20+ year old set. The design of this set was very appealing...wider easy to fill opening, wider cushioned grip for my now arthritic hands, clear delineations for grind size, and a top grinder so no more pepper/salt dust under where they sat. I've always found OXO products to be well designed and function well. These are no exception. Items arrived quickly and were properly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: c.a.t.

customer_reviews.title: What I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Good size/capacity, can grind from fine to coarse and points between, good looking, seem sturdy...no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W. Porter

customer_reviews.title: clever design!
customer_reviews.text: have used several salt and pepper grinder sets before I came upon this and love it! love the design that it can be kept upright and not spill salt and pepper all over the table after use. very sturdy and pretty at the same time. I'm sure this will last a much longer time than the last few I other brands I had bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sharms

customer_reviews.title: Best Salt & Pepper Grinders Out There
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom about a year and a half ago, and then after hearing her raving after going through a handful of supposedly nice shakers (and she's PICKY), bought them for myself! They're very sturdy -- they aren't made of plastic and make you feel like you could squeeze them and break them. There's a coarseness meter which only requires twisting. Rubber gripping. Both come pre loaded with salt and peppercorns. Best salt and pepper shaker I've ever used. Well worth the slightly expensive price-tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pepper grinder, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Salt grinder works great. Pepper grinder not so good, pepper barely comes out no matter if on maximum or minimum setting same amount comes out. Wish I could return, but past time to return. Thought it was going to be great after reading reviews, guess mine is defective. Bought in October 2017 five months ago. Seam to work okay at first, then got worse after use, like the round peppcorns plugged up product, I tried sticking a toothpick in from the outside into the holes but didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: William Cutrufelli

customer_reviews.title: Clever, practical and durable
customer_reviews.text: Gave up on electric grinders. These work better, are well designed, and stand up well to constant use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: iconkatz

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We have used a number of salt grinders and pepper grinders over the years, and this is our favorite, by far! We love the smart design and construction. Yep, Oxo did it again. The set uses non-corrosive, non-toxic materials for all the parts that come in contact with the salt, something that is very important to us, not only for durability over the long term, but for health reasons, as well. We also love the wide variety and ease of changing grind settings, the ease of filling, ease of grinding, the look. I guess you could say we love everything about this grinder set! We're ordering more sets for ourselves, and as gifts. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grinders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought expensive grinders for my salt and pepper at Crate & Barrel. They leaked everywhere and hard to turn. I bought these and our whole family loves them! I love the setting and grip. Well designed and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Best salt and pepper mills for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like Oxo products and these are no exception. Their products are easy to use, durable and often implement simple changes that make big improvements. In this case, the salt and pepper are stored with the mill facing up so you don't leave a mess when you set them down. I've had them for four years and they're still going strong. They're not too big and bulky, but they hold a lot of contents. They're also great for someone with arthritis since the grinders are big and easy to turn. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Love OXO Products and these Grinders are no different!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these salt and pepper grinders as a birthday gift to my sister-in-law. I absolutely love OXO products; I have many of them for the kitchen. These salt and pepper grinders are solid, sturdy, and intuitive to use. They come complete with a selection of grind settings, so you can get as coarse or as fine as you want. Beyond the utility of the grinders, they’re pretty stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but could improve on design and freshness of condiments.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was the old pepper in the pepper shaker that we had to throw out. I would have preferred no pepper to stale pepper. Also, it’s easy to try to use the other end and unscrew it.
customer_reviews.author: JYJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've got quite a collection of salt & pepper mills. When my husband saw these mills make an appearance, he asked if I'd ever find the perfect grinders. I said, "I just think I did." The design of these is fantastic. They're the perfect size--not so big that you feel like you're hefting a baseball bat, but large enough that you're not constantly refilling. It is so easy to adjust from fine to course with just a flick of the ring at the top. The grinder works well, producing lots of pepper and salt with just a small turn. They are A+ in the attractiveness department. I think I just found my new favorite shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Knew I had to buy them after I tried them.
customer_reviews.text: I first tried them at a cooking class and loved the quality since I first half them. I use them everyday, they're great quality and super easy to use. Rubber turning grip allows me to use with greasy hands and they're quick to adjust and refill. A little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Frank Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & operate smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Quite satisfied with these grinders. My previous other type grinders worked inconsistently but produced either very fine or very course results. With these grinders you get what you want and they work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great; but, the salt grind doesn't go as fine as I would prefer.
customer_reviews.text: Great; but, the salt grind doesn't go as fine as I would prefer. I do like the design. Easy to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: William Brannon

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and performance of these grinders. They are solidly made and very easy to use and a varied grind size selection. They have a nice heft to them and are easily refilled too. I would highly recommend these as a very good buy .
customer_reviews.author: jhstarz

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are priced a little high though
customer_reviews.author: Debbi:)

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good Grips Salt and Pepper Grinder Set
customer_reviews.text: These are great! No puddle of pepper where the pepper grinder is set down as you turn them upside down to use. Easy to grip because of their size - reminds me of the gigantic salt and pepper shakers my great grandmother had on her stove in the 1950's so they aren't the most dainty thing to set on the dining table. Excellent pepper delivery, a couple of quick twists is usually sufficient. Dimensions: about 5 1/2" tall, about 7 1/2" circumference. You might catch a glimpse of them in use on Jacques Pepin, Public Broadcasting Channel.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle NorthWest

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere if precision is what you want.
customer_reviews.text: Finest grind especially on the pepper is too coarse and not uniform. Some are fine, others much much coarser. Very disappointed considering the price. Photos are of the finest grind. No consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Cook

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it's gonna last...
customer_reviews.text: There's a good weight to these grinders. A weight that makes you think, "Hey you're well put together. Maybe I could get your number later and call you up." Not that grinders have phones, or arms and hands to answer them. But that's besides the point. They are also rather stylish, sexy even. The kind of sexy you would throw away your life for and run away with. Not that grinders can run, or that they have legs. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because it could grind smaller on the small setting. Other than that, it's well put together and sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Coarsening the grind is almost impossible
customer_reviews.text: I expected better from OXO. While the grinders work, the controls to regulate the grind are not very good. I like pepper that's coarsely ground and that's tough to accomplish. The bottom came loose on me and all the pepper corns fell out. What a mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Vey easy to use. Stays clean. Feels solid. Great for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy with one tiny gripe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set. These are slightly updated over my last set. They are easy to use and not too big. Just don’t drop them like I do on occasion and yours will last longer. They are sturdy and well made. The adjustment could technically be even more granular but good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cannon

customer_reviews.title: I’m doing it wrong
customer_reviews.text: Second time product purchased. I live in a humid area so I think you have to be super careful about the grinder not getting moisture inside. Keep it upside down (as seen in the picture) when not in use. Store in a dry place
customer_reviews.author: Dakramsta

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, no mess
customer_reviews.text: So far we are loving this set. It grinds easily without much effort, and having the easy-to-access selection dial for the coarseness of the grind is a real plus. It arrived filled, so haven't had a chance to see how easy (or not) that is. I'll update this when I do that.
customer_reviews.author: Teresafahey

customer_reviews.title: So far these grinders have provided good service. The second or third time that I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these grinders have provided good service. The second or third time that I used the salt shaker the bottom fell off. I screwed it back on after I picked up most of the salt that fell onto the counter. Not a happy incident. I have refilled both and am not having any trouble like another salt and pepper product I bought at Amazon. The adjusters work good. Although the salt is currently set in the middle setting and the crystals seem to be a bit on the large side. Just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: mathman54

customer_reviews.title: These are the best - and they are attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my daughter when I was living with her because my fingers were too weak to use her pepper grinder. These are AWESOME! The particle size can be controlled and the twist is very kind to painful hands.
customer_reviews.author: Merrygal

customer_reviews.title: Best Grinder Set EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several grinder sets in the past only to throw them away because they don't perform well. OXO has perfected the salt and pepper grinder set. This set holds a large amount of salt and pepper so you don't have to refill them every other day. They have adjustable grinder settings and are tall enough to be comfortable in your hand while grinding. The best feature is the product is dispensed from the top, not the bottom, so bye bye messy counters. Several family members and friends have gone out and purchased this set after using mine. Thanks OXO!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: When I was 16 years old, I never thought I'd get excited as I opened a box of salt and pepper grinders, but that was my reaction when I first saw these--Wow! They are much larger than I expected, but definitely not too big. They are very attractive and easy to hold. There is no residue as others have said you get from a different style of grinder. The way they grind from the top makes them very neat. I am very pleased with the price and the product. I plan to buy sets along with coarse sea salt and peppercorns for each of my married children next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, long lasting, excellent mills.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought my 1st pair from BBB & have been using them happily for years. I love the coarse grind of both the salt & pepper although the rings at the top let you adjust it to your taste. They are the easiest salt/pepper mills I’ve ever used. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Best salt and pepper grinders I own!
customer_reviews.text: I love these grinders because you set them upright instead of upside down on the grinder side where salt and pepper leak out and make a mess! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Hampton

customer_reviews.title: I really like that the mess stays in the top of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These confuse people at first because of the "upside down" design as compared to traditional grinders. I really like that the mess stays in the top of the shaker rather than is on the bottom and leaves traces of the spices on the table when sat down. I like that the coarseness can be adjusted to 4-5 levels. Several of my friends have used these at my house and have ordered them the next day because they are so great! Great design OXO!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: $45 for this is laughable, and I'm mad that I didn't return it. You'd think that for that money you'd get a pepper grinder that, you know, grinds pepper, but you don't with this. Instead, I have to sit there and twist for 30 seconds to just get the smallest amount of ground pepper, regardless of the size I have set. And yes I have cleaned it out. You can spend $10 and get grinders of equal quality. DON'T BUY THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Camden Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love these, we used a cheap grinder for so long it was nice to upgrade. These are easy to use and refill.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Good Grinders
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these OXO salt and pepper grinders for two months now, and am very happy with them. The coarseness level is easy to set and these have a good feel to them in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: W. COOl

customer_reviews.title: Missing salt shaker, no box, no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Oxo salt and pepper grinder set is great but the bubble package was missing the salt shaker, a box, instructions, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dink

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different grinder shakers and all have failed eventually. I had grinders from Sam's Club and they worked well, but cannot be refilled and must be kept far from heat (don't ask how I know this!) These are the perfect size for the table and for cooking with. They have several settings for different sizes and turn easily. I love these and hope they last a long time. Definitely recommend these, in fact, I am thinking of buying a set for our motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: crimmps49

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great look, sturdy, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I now add way too much pepper to things because I can't bring myself to stop using them. The design is great, no more having to worry about cleaning up a mess when I tip them back over, all the mess stays on top. The grip for the grinder fits your hand very well and is a nice soft but grippy rubber. The windows allow you to see how much salt is left, no more guessing games. Again, I find myself peppering more things now because I just love using these.
customer_reviews.author: Topperharley

customer_reviews.title: No Mess !!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set. We have a very long dining room table and having two sets is more convenient then passing one set up and down. It is very easy to adjust the grind size and the grinders are very easy to operate. The best part is of course no mess left on the table because these grind from the top. A few people have mentioned that the fill plugs can loosen during use, but if they are properly tightened and people are using them correctly that should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F. Jordano

customer_reviews.title: Great salt and pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism is so smooth. You have a great choice of your grind size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but not for fine grind
customer_reviews.text: I have used these salt/pepper mills for weeks now and they are well made and feel good in your hand. I like the fact they grind from the top so you don't get the remnants left on the table after use. My only caveat would be if you like your salt ground to a fine dust, these will not work for you. The pepper mills seems to do a better job of grinding finer, but the salt, even on the smallest setting leaves fairly large chunks. This is not an issue for me, but might be a deal-breaker for others. I would definitely recommend these for the price/quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: We read good reviews for these so we bought them. When they came we loved them and used them daily for about a week and then one broke. The cap that you remove to refill the salt popped off and would not stay on. It is plastic and it seems that the threading is defective. The return process was very easy and the new grinders came very quickly. But two days of use and one broke again- same exact problem. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very good grinder set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because my wife was not happy with our previous salt and pepper mills. These OXO mills seemed to fit the bill for us. While not infinitely adjustable like Peugeot and other mills, the five sizes of grind that are lever selectable give plenty of variance. The see through bodies are a nice touch and the mills are comfortable to use and relatively fast. It takes about 15 turns of the mill to produce about two teaspoons of pepper or salt.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on your table or on your stove
customer_reviews.text: My son has one and I always liked using it, so I bought it. I like the fact that you can regulate the grind in both pepper and salt. Both seem to taste fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.  Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: All the other reviews are correct - these are the best grinders. Easy to fill without spilling, easy to grind, good range of grid adjustment, discharge from the top so no spilling out the bottom when sitting at the table. HINT for successful grinding of some types of salt that are 'wet': put the salt in an open container in a frost free freezer. After a couple of days the salt will become 'dry' and grind nicely. I intend to get one for each type of salt and pepper for a fun table setting.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless Worker

customer_reviews.title: Guureat salt and pepper set
customer_reviews.text: My first salt and pepper shaker set purchased ever. Happy to write easy to handle with my medium size hands. Did not want to rely on a battery so decided to go with this. Hey comes filled with salt and pepper what is not to like. OXO's response to another customer's purchase claim(anal attentiveness) of the bottom lid fell loose after a while allowing the contents to fall out was spot on, confidence building and won me over.
customer_reviews.author: veranda tales

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, then they both failed on me
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these grinders since around August-September 2013 till present (June 2014). I loved them, I was happy. Then, the lid where you open the shaker for one I use for salt got stuck, VERY stuck, it's been stuck since Feb 2013. Then the other one I use pepper for starting leaking pepper before I would start grinding (June 2014), it's petty, but c'mon... Anyways, that's my story.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best salt and pepper grinders I have ever purchased. Well made and easy to use. Appreciate being able to adjust the grind size as needed. I have purchased a number of grinders only to have them break or stop working after a short while. These are a little more expensive than others I have purchased, but considering how much I have spent by repeatedly replacing others of poorer quality they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for about a month, and use them moderately. So far they have been very good. I like the fine/course selection. the design that has them stand so the salt and pepper outlets face upward is great, no more messy counter. They feel like they are built well and are would not be prone to breaking. Time will have to tell on that though.
customer_reviews.author: DBurgie

customer_reviews.title: OXO Comes Through Again
customer_reviews.text: We were searching for a new pepper grinder and ended up purchasing this set even though a salt grinder was something we really weren't interested in. The mechanisms on both the pepper and salt grind smoothly, easily and with moderate resistance. The grind can be adjusted from coarse to very fine. We keep ours somewhere in the middle. We're very satisfied with the pepper grinder. The salt grinder is a plus. Glad we ordered this set.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of cooking and use a lot of fresh pepper and salt. I was tired of having pepper grinders that I had to stand there and twist for like 5 minutes to get the amount of pepper I wanted. These are pretty pricy but totally worth it! I get all the pepper I need with ease, and you can choose how coarse it is. I was about to attach my pepper grinder to a hand drill before I found these! Wouldn't cook without them now.
customer_reviews.author: Kumaraisin

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable grinders
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are a great set. They look nice and don't take too much time to grind. They both have 4 or 5 (?) size adjustments for anywhere from fine, to quite large grains. They can be switched quickly and easy. They twist from the bottom so they won't leave around a residue. The one issue I had is someone accidentally twisted in the wrong direction and the bottom came off spilling the peppercorns. But that does mean refilling them is quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: adm533

customer_reviews.title: Nice grinders
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best grinders I could find for the money, though a bit pricey (-1 star). Adjustment works very good but not exactly a consistent grind, you get larger and smaller particles on each setting. Best part is the fact that you have to turn them over to grind/dispense and the feel of the rubbery grip is great for holding on. Still, overall seem fairly well made and would buy again but only at sale price. Time wil tell on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: reddwarf

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Best salt and pepper grinder I ever owned. Really like variable grind settings
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie E. Keammerer

customer_reviews.title: Best salt and pepper grinder I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best salt and pepper grinder set I've ever had the pleasure of trying out/owning. Unlike other salt and pepper grinders, this one is incredibly easy to use, easy to adjust coarseness, and very smooth to twist. It may not be the MOST aesthetically pleasing pair, but it's well-worth the money for anyone that prefers to grind their salt and pepper. I purchased a pair for my mom as well and she already wants a few others! HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: peanut

customer_reviews.title: Most Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This set is well constructed, adjustable and most reliable. We’ve used many but these are the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Petito

customer_reviews.title: Favorite grinders so far
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased quite a few grinders over the years, both salt and pepper. These by far are out performing all the others. I would recommend them to anyone without any reservations at all. worth every penny at this point in use.
customer_reviews.author: PhysicsMike

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. (1) Sleek, modern appearance - can go from kitchen counter; love the appearance through the acrylic of the peppercorn & Himalayan pink salt (separately purchased) (2) Operation - ergonomic and easy to fill (receptacle opens easily with threaded cap on bottom); easy to adjust grind with tab at the top (3) Performance is superb
customer_reviews.author: n1cf2

customer_reviews.title: Works great for about two months.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design that keeps the counters clean by putting the grinding area on the top of the mills. That's brilliant. What's not, however, is the pepper mill that stopped working about two months into owning it. Well, actually it didn't work unless you shook it and then operated the grinding wheel by turning it about a half turn clockwise and then back, really fast. About two weeks ago, it stopped working altogether. Took it apart, cleaned it, tried again. No luck. Only bought the set on Feb 4 of last year, so I wouldn't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Never a Problem
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for several months and can report that NEITHER mill has presented problems for us. Wondered if some are using the fill top to turn the mill, as it is the first thing you see when turning the mills up for use. This could wear out the fill top as it was never designed to take that much stress/use. We grind coarse salt and peppercorns, and like then so much we purchased a second set for the table.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferrando

customer_reviews.title: Best Grinder set in my entire life!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and my husband got me these as a birthday gift...and what a gift! I put coarse sea salt in the salt grinder and organic black pepper in the pepper grinder....perfection! The salt has a white ring around the holes and the pepper grinder has a black ring. Because the holes are kept at the top when not in use, there's no mess underneath! Very stylish. We both would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Granma

customer_reviews.title: Great salt Mill and pepper grinder, easy to use/adjust
customer_reviews.text: We love this grinder set, it works well and has lasted several months and still works like new. Highly recommend. Only warning I have is that the Salt mill can produce a lot of salt rather quickly, so there is no need to turn it like you would the pepper grinder, unless you like a lot of salt. Once you have used it once or twice you get the feel of how much you need to turn to produce the salt you want.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. The rubber bottoms make them easy to turn, even with wet hands. I also like that they sit upright so you don't have salt and pepper residue on your shelf. Being adjustable is always nice too. Don't get me wrong, I love classic big wood grinders but for practical purposes these are much better.
customer_reviews.author: IPv6Freely

customer_reviews.title: my brother liked them
customer_reviews.text: i bought a pair of these for myself in 2014 and they have held up well since then. i gifted a set to my brother and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: jacob pena

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite the upgrade from anything I've ever used before. Really nicely made and thought out. You can't ask for a nicer product, I assure you. Adjustable grind works great, very well constructed. I love the way the sit upright until ready to be used so you don't have salt/pepper spill out every time you set them down. Big 'ol knob for grinding in easy to handle. These are very nice, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great grinders. I like the opening that is at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grinders. I like the opening that is at the top and not on the bottom. It is much easier than removing a cover, or having grind remains left on the counter top. The bottom grips are nice to handle and they are easy to adjust for smaller or larger grind. I think anyone who purchases these grinders will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: OXO Gets It Right Again
customer_reviews.text: OXO consistently makes great kitchen products and these don't disappoint. I don't know why other manufacturers haven't thought of dispensing the salt and pepper from the top instead of the bottom. It's such a simple solution to a common problem. These grinders do not leave salt or pepper on the table when you set them down. Apparently OXO has redesigned these because the fill ports on ours are sealed with screw in plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Star

customer_reviews.title: Best salt and pepper mills!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm!! I’ve gone through many salt and pepper grinders and hate them within 6 months but these are easy to use and haven’t failed me yet!!!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN MCPHERSON

customer_reviews.title: These should last me
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using pepper/salt grinders for a long time instead of the pregrounds. I was only buying the battery operated ones but I would be feeding those grinders battery candy. And besides those grinders would not hold much. Went to the mechanical, but the cheaper ones. With all the money spent, I should of spent the money on a better set. This set looks and feels durable. And these grinders should take my daily abuse.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and functional to leave on the counter or use on the table for company.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Work wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Salt and pepper set is so nice visitors to my home have asked where I got them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

OXO GOOD GRIPS SALT & PEPPER GRINDER SET: 
 In the kitchen or at the dining table, the OXO Good Grips Salt & Pepper Grinder Set is always in season. The Grinders are easily adjustable from fine to coarse grind and rest flat when upside down for easy refilling. Non-corrosive ceramic grinders won’t absorb flavors or odors, and are positioned at the top of the Grinders so as not to leave a mess on the counter or table. The Grinders have a soft, non-slip grip for comfortable grinding. Stainless steel accents and clear bodies give the Grinders kitchen-to-table appeal – great for preparing and serving meals. Sold filled with sea salt and black peppercorns.

 IT’S THE LITTLE THINGS: 
At OXO, we consistently develop products that address even the tiniest of pet peeves, because we know it’s the little things that make the biggest difference. Our Salt & Pepper Grinder Set grinds from the top, so you can avoid leaving a trail of salt & pepper across your countertop. 

FEATURES & BENEFITS:
Ceramic Grinders will not absorb flavors or odors, providing the best performance for multi-use grinding Top Grinding mechanism helps ensure countertops are clean and free of salt and pepper Wide openings and level tops allow Grinders to rest flat while upside down for easy refilling Large, soft, non-slip base allows for comfortable, easy grinding, perfect for seasoning large batches of food Smoothly Rotating Tabs help make adjusting Grinder settings from fine to coarse a breeze Stainless Steel Accents provide kitchen-to-table appeal 



GOOD TIP: 
Our Grinders are also great for grinding whole spices like cumin, coriander and cloves. When you’re ready to switch ingredients, just grind some coarse salt through the Grinder to clean. 





OXO IS DEDICATED TO PROVIDING INNOVATIVE CONSUMER PRODUCTS THAT MAKE EVERYDAY LIVING EASIER. 
How do we do it? We study people – lefties and righties, male and female, young and old – interacting with products and identify ways to make them better. Our “question everything” process and relentless attention to detail uncover the best solutions for slicing, peeling, whisking, baking, stirring, washing, scrubbing, dusting, storing and organizing.
